data.eml:eml: Two new species of Xiphocentronidae (Trichoptera) and their bionomics in Central Amazonia, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pes, Ana Maria, Hamada, Neusa, Nessimian, Jorge Luiz, Soares, Climéia C. (2013): Two new species of Xiphocentronidae (Trichoptera) and their bionomics in Central Amazonia, Brazil. Zootaxa 3636 (4): 561-574, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3636.4.4
